content.text:
# Jalan Pulau Tawar-Durian Hijau

Jalan Jengka Utara-Barat Federal Route 64
| direction_b = Southeast
| terminus_b  = Pulau Tawar
| destinations= Kampung PerianKampung BandarKampung Kepala PulauKampung Bukit Nikmat
}}
Jalan Pulau Tawar-Durian Hijau (Pahang state route C143) is a major road in Pahang, Malaysia.
